Get To Know Ted Tobiason, GetInsureds New CFO
By GetInsured|Friday, March 12, 2021
Earlier this week,we announced that Ted Tobiason joinedGetInsuredin the role of Chief Financial Officer.Ted spent 23 years as a technology investment banker focusing mostly on IPOs as well as convertible debt and private placements. Hisclients included Uber, Airbnb,SoFi, Cruise Automation, Twitter, Alibaba, Tesla, and Lucid Motors. Ted most recently wasCFO at Lime,which operated scooters, e-bikes and shared cars in more than 100 cities and 32 countries.
